column1: Use this file as a template for building description files for an Grid Card kneeboard. Columns for additional variations or flights should be added between Column C and D.
Rows in italics are comments and may be deleted safely

column5: Template file name, must be "KBT_Bases.svg" for airbase information card kneeboards
Base name for output files, "FLIGHT" is replaced with flight name from flight's column heading. If empty, default is the template name with _FLIGHT.
Optional title for card header, can be blank
Optional version number for card footer, can be blank
Apply night tint layer when value is anything other than blank

column3:
J-ROCK  – SA-6 Down
BOTTLE KIDS – Beach head clear
RICKY – Sipan int clear
BUBBLES – Launch alert
LEEROY – Bombers detected
ALAMO – AG fall-back

ECHO CAP -1/2, WHISKEY CAP -3/4, Grinder 30nm legs
On contact, off-side elem EGRESS SOUTH SP3/6, join on-side elem to support
Watch MAR and avoid merge
Refuel, rearm at Rota (PGRO) – NO AAR available
DUDE, BREW available to assist CAP if necessary
PACE [TAC] – GOLD 270.000 U4, LIME 1 273.000 U11, BLACK 255.000 U6
PACE [AUX] – 138.NNN to 137.NNN
